wikipedia_page.main: Zara Dawson (born 24 September 1983) is an English actress and television presenter.

response: Two years later the Brewer family moved back to the city and were replaced by Jackie (Denise Welch), Tony Murphy (Ricky Tomlinson), and their wayward daughter Emma (Zara Dawson), who owned the local pub. The final series was broadcast in 2005.

Actors from the school include Zara DawsonWithey, Sally, "The famous old boys and girls from Norfolk Independent schools ", Eastern Daily Press, 18 March 2010. and Claire Goose."Norfolk youth's gold winners – Claire Goose hands out Duke of Edinburgh's gold awards", Eastern Daily Press, 29 June 2006.
Eve O'Brien was played by Zara Dawson from October until the end of the programme.

Breathe is a 2009 British independent film directed by Nicholas Winter and starring Ricci Harnett, Zara Dawson, Lee Otway and Jing Lusi.http://film.britishcouncil.org/breathe2http://www.cinando.com/DefaultController.aspx?PageID=FicheFilm&IdC=7599&IdF=63220 The film was shot on location in London and Somerset in 2007, and debuted at the Genesis Cinema in London in 2009. Breathe was released on DVD in March 2010 and was well received at the London Independent Film Festival 2010, with Nicholas Winter taking the award for Best Director.http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/hr/content_display/film/news/e3i791eb4a866761a301fca7cd51f96a897 The film has an accompanying soundtrack, composed by Greg Harwood.http://theskeletoncrewquarterly.blogspot.com/2010/02/breathe-ost-gregory-harwood.html
